newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $340 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $340 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Thursday, May 8 are expected to total $340 million in 19 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $220 million in five sales, with a $125 million Massachusetts Ports deal through Merrill Lynch & Co. topping the list.
On the competitive side, 14 sales totaling $120 million are on the schedule. A $54 million Minnesota Health Facilities Authority deal at 1030 EDT is the largest.
An additional three sales totaling $68 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds Thursday depending on market conditions.
